metaInfo.title: Masterclass
metaInfo.desc: Enroll in the System Design Event and learn from live classes. Get Knowledge by working on industry projects.

aboutThisMasterclass: The role of data science in banking has become increasingly important in recent years. Banks are always looking for ways to optimize their operations, and data scientists are the ones who help them do it.

In this webinar, we'll share the skills and knowledge you need to become a banking data science expert. We'll also cover the current job market and career advancement opportunities to help you take your career to new heights.
So, put on your data science cap and join us on this journey to become the King of Banking.
We can't wait to help you succeed!
topicsCoveredMasterclass: Adoption & Application of AI, ML & Big Data in Banking
Integration of Business with Technology & its Benefits
Cost-Cutting using AI Fraud Detection & Automation using AI
Compliance Risks & Bias in AI for Banks
Market & Technology Trends Driving the Adoption of AI in Banking
ROI Measurement Criteria with AI in Banking
eventFeatureData.masterclassForHeading1: Banking professionals looking to upskill in data science in the banking domain
eventFeatureData.masterclassForHeading2: BFSI professionals who want to predict loan defaults and forecast insurance pricing
eventFeatureData.masterclassForHeading3: Executive-level BFSI professionals dreaming of securing a position at the forefront of BFSI
eventFeatureData.masterclassForHeading4: BFSI managers & leaders who want to incorporate data-driven practices into their business
eventFeatureData.masterclassForHeading5: Data scientists looking to make a meaningful impact in the banking domain
eventFeatureData.heading4: What our Learners have to say
aboutLearnbay: We are a leading provider of specialized courses in data science, data analytics, artificial intelligence and full-stack software development. We are dedicated to helping working professionals advance their careers and gain the technical expertise needed to succeed in the fast-paced world of technology.
eventFeatureData.aboutLearnbayHeading: Some of our standout features include:
standoutFeatures: Curriculum that is developed, supervised and approved by industry experts
1:1 mentorship from top experts in the field
Opportunities to gain technical expertise through real-world projects
Over 250 hiring partners and dedicated placement support
standoutFeaturesLastHead: Sign up for a free demo class and enroll in the domain of your choice.
